title: No biochemical research
content:
2002 the Moffitt cancer centre in Florida, a world cancer centre, published the use of High Intensity Ultrasound to totally clear cancer at one session. Their High Intensity Ultrasound did not just cause cancer celsl to give off X-rays, but experience cel lcontent boiling and fragment. Cancer Research maintain HIUS only works for a limited selection of cancers – no! It clears all 200 cancers out there. There is no rational reason for Cancer Research to still exist. It induces registered dococtors t oresearhc biopchemistry: but the hippocratic oath demanded all research work into defective biochemical treatmetns stop in 2002. And receive 25 years in jail ofr each individual they have killed. And pay a legal fine of 10 million. Molecular Nuclear Fusion – as above, was published by physics in the 1980s.
